name: Jingle Cats Please
description:
This is my "Papers Please" parody game for the yogscast jingle jam 2021. This is a simplified version of papers please with limited mechanics. There are only just 6 characters to review with no time limit. 

CONTROLS / HOW-TO

Mouse-only controls

Move and drag objects to the right side to inspect

Pull out stamp machine by clicking and dragging.

Position passport under stamper

Click stamper to stamp.

Drag stamped passport back to character.

You may re-stamp the passport

RULES

Must provide a jingle-cat which is specifically a cat with a santa hat

No bribes or gifts can be accepted

Controls and rules sheets found in bottom left

CREDITS

Art + Programming by Tom Doy (me :3)

Colour Palette used (with some additions)

PAPERS, PLEASE THEME BUT IT'S PLAYED ON A CAT PIANO AND A DRUM CALCULATOR

Papers Please by Lucas Pope

I made Jingle cats Doom last year if you are looking for more :p
